name: Simulator gas station
description:
Unusual 2D game is a genre simulator, gives you the opportunity to feel in the role of the main at the gas station. The main thing that will need to do this is to refuel cars, but not only, you need a lot more, for example, to monitor the level of fuel in tanks and order them in time, improve the refueling and build buildings that yield profits and much more.

The beginning of the refueling career You have an auto fueling station and 250,000 in cash. At the very beginning, you need to buy fuel in the tank, you have them empty. Only 3 types of fuel are available, these are 95, 92 and 80. The advice is to buy each one for 1 ton. Next, you need to set the price of fuel on the scoreboard. After that, you can let the cars into the gas station and refuel them without forgetting to give change.

★ Service
Gives an opportunity to repair the columns, order a truck with the selected fuel and in what quantities, as well as see how much it is in the tanks.

★ Shop
The most important place where you can buy improvements to a filling station, for example, put another column, or buy a new type of fuel, put a fire fighting system that will reduce the costs of accidents and damage from fires and explosions. Just here you can buy a cafe and car wash building.

★ Statistics
How many liters are filled, how many cars are tucked in, how many liters of each type of fuel is filled, how much is spent, how much is earned, experience and the level of the refueler.

★ Music
In the game there is a tape recorder and there are 20 songs in it that can be switched.
